quests.desc: Welcome to another exciting session of TextWorld! First stop, recover the fudge scented passkey from the floor of the playroom. After that, unlock the fudge scented door. Then, open the fudge scented door. If you have opened the fudge scented door, attempt to take a trip south. With that over with, recover the passkey from the floor of the parlor. Having picked up the passkey, unlock the gate inside the parlor with the passkey. After that, doublecheck that the gate is wide open. Then, go east. That done, make an attempt to head south. And then, make it so that the box is closed. And if you do that, you're the winner!
commands: unlock fudge scented door with fudge scented passkey
unlock fudge scented door with fudge scented passkey

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber. A typical one. You begin looking for stuff.

 Oh, great. Here's a box.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_0]On the bench you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bathroom. An usual one.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a cabinet.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_1]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The cabinet is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bedroom. A standard one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a bar. The room is well lit.

 [if c_2 is locked]A locked[else if c_2 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] safe, which looks typical, is in the corner.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a garage. You begin looking for stuff.

 You see a chest. Now that's what I call TextWorld![if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You arrive in a shower. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] dresser.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The dresser is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You are in an office. An usual kind of place.

 You can make out [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling a study.



There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchenette. The room is well lit.

 You see a freezer.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The freezer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
Wow! You're in a parlor. The room is well lit.



 There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] fudge scented door leading north.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You are in a workshop. A standard one. You begin looking for stuff.



 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone gate leading east.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You're now in the lounge.

 You can see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] TextWorld limited edition locker in the room.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The TextWorld limited edition locker contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The TextWorld limited edition locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just walked into a salon.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone portal leading east. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone gate leading west.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You're now in a canteen.

 You make out a case. Now why would someone leave that there?[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The case contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The case is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see a counter. The counter is standard.[if there is something on the s_1] On the counter you see [a list of things on the s_1]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the counter.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone portal leading west.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a restroom.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cubicle. An ordinary kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an attic. A normal one.

 You can see [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] suitcase.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber. An usual kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You make out a bed stand. The bed stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the bed stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. You think about smashing the bed stand to bits, throwing the bits in a fire, etc, until you get bored.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the cookery. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can see a platter. The platter is typical.[if there is something on the s_3] On the platter you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a playroom. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You make out [if c_10 is locked]a locked[else if c_10 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] spherical safe nearby.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The spherical safe contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The spherical safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] fudge scented door leading south.

walkthrough: unlock fudge scented door with fudge scented passkey

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an fast paced round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. Your first objective is to recover the fudge scented passkey from the floor of the playroom. If you have taken the fudge scented passkey, unlock the fudge scented door inside the playroom. And then, make absolutely sure that the fudge scented door within the playroom is wide open. After that, go to the south. And then, pick up the passkey from the floor of the parlor. After that, check that the gate inside the parlor is unlocked with the passkey. Then, make absolutely sure that the gate is opened. After opening the gate, move east. After that, venture south. And then, assure that the box within the chamber is shut. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
